name: Epic Mammott
description: Mammotts may not shovel snow, but Epic Mammotts sure do! This many-limbed Monster has evolved to become the ultimate snow shoveling machine. Four furry arms for maximum snow removal, pointed claws and horns to crack stubborn ice, and floppy ears to protect its delicate eyes from rogue snowballs make Epic Mammott the ideal neighbor.
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 5 hr, Enhanced Time: 3 hr 45 min
